amendment.description: Amendment sought to require a person provide at least 24 hours notice to a law enforcement officer of the State of the intention to possess or carry a concealed handgun in the State.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 112-283 to require a person provide at least 24 hours notice to a law enforcement officer of the State of the intention to possess or carry a concealed handgun in the State.

action.text: Amendment (A007) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 123 - 299 (Roll no. 849).
